changeSet.author: doncoffee
changeSet.sql: create table `confectionery-store`.cookie ( cookie_id int auto_increment primary key, composition varchar(255) null, price double null, type varchar(255) null, weight double null, brand_id int null, store_id int null, supplier_id int null, constraint FK937f7f0oa718h8ojphqj7s2el foreign key (supplier_id) references `confectionery-store`.supplier (store_id), constraint FKb570r21t4nrkvi65nkuj5weva foreign key (brand_id) references `confectionery-store`.brand (brand_id), constraint FKbvb3nai0jv5cgsxpi8fv7x5lt foreign key (store_id) references `confectionery-store`.store (store_id) );
